alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Scott and western Yell Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Danville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Ranger... Wing... Olio... Kingston... Bluffton... Rover... Blue Ball... Sunlight Bay Park... Spring Lake Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest
